headline: House Democrats Subpoenaed Nine Banks in Trump Finance Probe

summary: The next generation of in-flight trackers will offer a much higher level of detail, taking fliers in a new, more commercial, direction.

headline: Key Lobbying Tool in Trump Era: The President’s Ear
summary: Entrepreneur and Republican donor Cynthia Fisher, after years of fighting in Washington for patient rights, is gaining traction in the Trump era.

headline: Herman Cain Won’t Withdraw From Consideration for Fed Board
summary: Herman Cain said he has no intention of withdrawing his name from consideration for a seat on the Fed board, despite apparently lacking enough Senate support to be confirmed if President Trump nominates him.
